minhalvp/android-mcp-server

Control Android devices via ADB for screenshots, UI analysis, and package management

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • MCP server for Android’s Tasker automation app
  • GUI for adb to modify android devices
  • Bridge between AI agents and Android devices
  • MCP server for Apk Tool with live reverse engineering support
  • Static analysis for Android apps based on the OWASP MASVS framework
  • Mirrors and controls Android devices via USB or TCP/IP
  • Manages Android files on macOS via ADB
  • Control Android devices with desktop GUI over ADB
  • Track, analyze, and block network connections on Android without root
  • TUI file manager for Android Debug Bridge
